thread.title_full: 47. Straight Outta Oz (Deluxe Version) - Todrick Hall

title: 47. Straight Outta Oz (Deluxe Version) - Todrick Hall
text: Born: April 4, 1985 in Arlington, TX Genre: Pop Years Active: '10s Hailing from Arlington, Texas, Todrick Hall is an American entertainer who rose to fame after making it to the semi-finals of the ninth season of American Idol in 2010. A man of many talents that include singing, acting, dance choreography, and directing, Hall decided to transform his brief moment of into a fully-fledged career that traversed the arts. He began by creating an ongoing series of viral videos dedicated to some of his favorite music artists. Stating that the idea of talent show graduates... Top Albums and Songs by Todrick Hall 1.
